task

public void task(java.lang.String args)
Set current task focus. Namespace may be omitted if it is unambiguous in currently loaded task models. JavaScript to compute all declared input and output slot values is optional (in order declared). Skipped slots can be specified by '/ /'.

Hint: If Javascript contains '/', use 'eval' command to set temporary variable and use variable in 'done'.

Parameters:
args - <id> [<namespace>] [ / <value> ]*

by

public void by(java.lang.String args)
Select decomposition class for current focus task.

Parameters:
args - <id>

done

public void done(java.lang.String args)
Report user performance of primitive task. Task class defaults to suggested next task. JavaScript to compute all declared input and output slot values is required (in order declared). Success slot value is optional (and last). Skipped slots can be specified by '/ /'.

Hint: If Javascript contains '/', use 'eval' command to set temporary variable and use variable in 'done'.

Parameters:
args - [<id> [<namespace>]] [ / <value> ]*

done

protected void done(Task occurrence)

execute

public void execute(java.lang.String args)
Like 'done', but first executes script associated with primitive task, if any. Convenient for running simulations.

See Also:
done(String)

next

public void next(java.lang.String ignore)
Advise the user what needs to be done next.

yes

public void yes(java.lang.String ignore)
Accept system proposals.

no

public void no(java.lang.String ignore)
Reject system proposals.
